channel.title: Born Entity [Team Needed]
channel.description:
[center]I need some staff for my server to help me get it up and running![/center] [center]Here are some of the positions i need Server Coder: 0/2 Client Coder: 0/2 Forum coder: 1/2 (Michael) Advertiser: 1/2 (JayJay) Idea Man: 1/2 (Lewis)[/center] [center]If you get any of these positions doesn't mean that you get automatic mod or admin! Remember that[/center]
[center]Application Position wanted: Experience: Any past work we can see or someone we can talk to to make sure?: Will you abuse your powers if you are Admin/Mod?: Will you complete your work and not slack off/not do your job?: Why do you think you'd benefit PkPortalz?: Why do you want this job?: Any additional information:[/center]
[center]You may apply for up to 2 positions[/center] [center]Contact Info Skype: zach.amrein If you don't have a skype, please make one. Thank you for reading this, we hope you'll apply.[/center] [img]http://img821.imageshack.us/img821/8650/screenshot20110522at313.png[/img] [img]http://img98.imageshack.us/img98/8650/screenshot20110522at313.png[/img] [img]http://img853.imageshack.us/img853/7526/screenshot20110522at314.png[/img] [img]http://img198.imageshack.us/img198/4307/screenshot20110522at315.png[/img] [img]http://img163.imageshack.us/img163/6673/screenshot20110522at316.png[/img] [img]http://img804.imageshack.us/img804/1286/screenshot20110522at317.png[/img] [img]http://img706.imageshack.us/img706/319/screenshot20110522at318.png[/img] [img]http://img689.imageshack.us/img689/2556/screenshot20110522at319.png[/img] [img]http://img51.imageshack.us/img51/2556/screenshot20110522at319.png[/img] [img]http://img808.imageshack.us/img808/3471/screenshot20110522at320.png[/img] [img]http://img545.imageshack.us/img545/4559/screenshot20110522at321.png[/img] [img]http://img801.imageshack.us/img801/4559/screenshot20110522at321.png[/img] join guys. its a very good server with many things to do :)) ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Items: - pvp armors - Spirit shields - all color infinity robes - rings (i) - fury ornament kit - dungeon cape - godswords - D-Claws - Staff of light - barrows - curses - hand cannon - over loads - full dragon - full santa - all phats - full primal armor/weapons - dragon defender - full void ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Minigames: - full working barrows - PestControl - Warrior Guild - Duel Arena(staking) - TzHaar Cave ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Bosses: - GodWars - King Black Dragon - Dagonnoth King - Tormented Demons - Corporeal Beast ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Pk Teles: - Mage Bank - Green Dragons (13 wilderness) - Multi pk zones - Edgeville - PvP Zones ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Skills Tele!! Agility and Hunter!!! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Features: 634 Items - Check Shop Picture 602 Npc’s Summoning - Cats, Dogs, Penguin, Dragons [Dragons are donator only] Anims Flashing are fixed - hand cannon stance works without flashing Allot Of Shops - Check Shop Picture Good Bosses - Avatar Of Destruction and Penance Queen going to be added ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Owner - Rjfire Co-Owners - Lewis

item.title: Born Entity [Team Needed]
item.dc:creator: @gnomez gnomez
item.description:
@gnomez wrote:

Position wanted: ingame moderator and advertiser

Experience: owned 1 server co owned another pretty much what everyone is saying

Any past work we can see or someone we can talk to to make sure?: i can pm you about 3 websites i made but thats it

Will you abuse your powers if you are Admin/Mod?: no

Will you complete your work and not slack off/not do your job?: yes

Why do you think you’d benefit PkPortalz?: i am usually on my computer at least 5+ hours a day and you only have 1 moderator

Why do you want this job?: why not? i guess it would just be a fun experience

Any additional information: i played runescape for about 3 years so i know what most of everything is i have coded pi and delta some 500+ but not many so i know my way around most servers i have used various website hosts so i know my way around websites as well

@ above your missing some info

Read full topic

item.title: Born Entity [Team Needed]
item.dc:creator: @Dharma Dharma
item.description:
@Dharma wrote:

Position wanted: Server coder.

Any past work we can see or someone we can talk to to make sure?: Hmmm. I don’t have any but I’ve worked with a lot of other people.

Will you abuse your powers if you are Admin/Mod?: Of course not. I’m just here so I can help others. Don’t care much about staff spot…

Will you complete your work and not slack off/not do your job?: No, I’m not a slacker. I’m a dedicated worker.

Why do you think you’d benefit PkPortalz?: The reason why I think I’d benefit PkPortalz is because I’m really good keeping things in order.

Why do you want this job?: As stated above, I like helping others and I love just working private servers.

Any additional information: I’ve been coding for about 2 years on 317’s and 508’s. I started on 562s like 8 months ago and it’s going pretty good. I set it aside though. Thinking about releasing it to the community.

Read full topic

item.title: Born Entity [Team Needed]
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

[quote=“Itz Cian, post:17, topic:393332”]Position Wanted: I would like to be an in-game administrator.

Experience:I actually owned a few servers before and I believe I will be a perfect administrator for you

Any past work we can see or someone we can talk to to make sure?:I mostly used Ucoz and I don’t know if the people I have played with are still using the chatbox there, but if they are you can ask about me(Owner of Nightscape).

Will you abuse your powers if you are Admin/Mod?:I definitely will not abuse my powers. I am a very honest guy and I just want to help the server grow and the players have fun.

Will you complete your work and not slack off/not do your job?:Yes, I am not the type of person to slack off on anything.

Why do you think you’d benefit Realm of Heroes?:I can benefit Realm of Heroes in numerous ways by first of all judging by the rules, while helping new players find their way through the game.

Why do you want this job?:I believe that this will be a fun and great experience for me and all of us if I was to be selected.

Any additional information:Well I am 15 years old I play volleyball (RESPECT) I hope you will select me to be one of your administrators. :)[/quote]

what does volleyball have to do with respect? and if you read the title its PkPortalz not Realm of Heroes

Read full topic

Why do you want this job?:I believe that this will be a fun and great experience for me and all of us if I was to be selected.

item.title: Born Entity [Team Needed]
item.dc:creator: @man1412 man1412
item.description:
@man1412 wrote:

Position wanted: (Wish there was forum creator) But uhh… I will go with Ingame Admin and probably Idea man and if the Idea man doesnt turn out right then its fine

Experience: Didnt know there was much experience in disciplining, pretty much I just know what to do when someone comes to me about either hacks or he did this and that… Always ask for proof if there is none then I can not react on anything and another… I of course no there is no item giving unless instructed to by higher authority…

Any past work we can see or someone we can talk to to make sure?: (Forums - Just my mom)

Will you abuse your powers if you are Admin/Mod?: I have no intentions of abusing any power giving to me

Will you complete your work and not slack off/not do your job?: I am free almost every single and have no problem with completing anything assigned to me

Why do you think you’d benefit Realm of Heroes?: Hmmm maybe not me benefiting from it but me helping others realize that a real admin, takes a job seriously and will do what is necessary and most appropriate

Why do you want this job?: To help you by having a more intelligent Admin and to actually be the one disciplining them.

Any additional information: I am 18, yes the only person you will have to contact about forums work is my mom cause she has seen my previous work before everything got viruses on my computer. So now I am running on a laptop which I am available anytime anywhere I go. Just message me on my Skype and I will be able to talk and see whats going on. If you want my Skype just PM me.

Read full topic
